comment.author: 31580040@N04
comment._content: Percy Grainger en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percy_Grainger 1882 - 1961 was a composer, performer, and collector of folk music. He was born in Australia, trained in Germany, lived in England, before moving to the USA in 1914 where he took US citizenship.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Australian Pianist/Composer. See notes under His mother was Rosa (Rose) Annie Aldridge Grainger (1866-1922), a biographical page devoted to her at the Grainger Museum site: www.grainger.unimelb.edu.au/percy/rose.html

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: Retired at last and artolog: Thank you for the information on Grainger and his mother. We will add more details to the catalog record.
